name: Pig Simulator (itch)
description:
You play as a pig - your goal is to have fun. 
How to play online? enter a multiplayer game, then your friend will create a room (MINIMUM 4 LETTERS) and your friend will say the name of the room and you enter this name and press: Join the room.  
Control: 
W - forward 
S- back 
A - left 
D - right  
HAVE A GOOD GAME!
